value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Alfonse, what are you saying?
Líf...is you?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|He did not confirm it, but nor did he
deny it. I fear I am correct.$k$pHe is not the first king of Askr. He
is me—from another Askr.$k$pHe must know something about the
Heart's Rite.$k$p$Sbs4000|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|The Heart's Rite? Now what's that?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|It sounds like an Emblian ceremony,
perhaps...$k$pWait—Princess Veronica? What
are you doing here? HOW did
you get here?$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_02,0|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Hel's army has continued to advance.
Embla is threatened. That is why.$k$pAs for how, I asked Loki.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I see. Have you come to help us
defeat Hel?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Oh, yes.$k$pHel must be killed. Until then, I
will ally with you.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Now that's a surprise! I just hope
you won't end up stabbing us in
the back.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Shh.$k$pEnemies are approaching—over there.$k$p

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|The army of the dead...$k$pYou take care of them. When you've
finished, we can talk.$k$pI'll rest for now. After coming all this
way...I'm tired.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|So selfish! Just as I suspected—you
have no intention of helping us!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|The Heart's Rite is a ceremony
that can kill Hel. Hmm...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Indeed. But that's all we know.
Details were scant.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Let's be on our way.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Where do you suggest we go?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Embla, of course.$k$pIf this Askr has records of the rite,
then the Embla here must have
some as well.$k$p$Sbs150|
